lines: Tunyina munzi mubotu, Tatuyandi wa mu nyika;
Pesi atu komanisye, Mbotu langa munzi umbi,
Tunyina munzi mubotu, Tulanga uta libonyi;
Zioni ndi zina lyawo, U lasalala bunene,
Nci lawo ca kuumuna, Nci lawo ca banununwa;
Moyo wangu ko umuna, Ulizyi cindi ceelede;
Nkubotu ndi munyonene, Limwi mwini a ndi lesye,
